oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Do you get all the milk? The importance of stockmanship
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sorge, Ulrike S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dairy
stockmanship
welfare
well-being
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The importance of human-animal interaction for the well-being and production of dairy cattle is increasingly recognized. This paper discusses the impact of stockmanship skill and worker attitude on production and animal well-being on dairy farms.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2014; 59-61
